trans-unit.resname: KHC·1 | Lathril, Blade of the Elves | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Lathril, Blade of the Elves deals combat damage to a player, create that many 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: 每当妖精之刃拉席莉对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，派出等量的1/1绿色妖精／战士衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·1 | Lathril, Blade of the Elves | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {T}, Tap ten untapped Elves you control: Each opponent loses 10 life and you gain 10 life.
trans-unit.target: {T}，横置十个由你操控且未横置的妖精：每位对手各失去10点生命，且你获得10点生命。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·2 | Ranar the Ever-Watchful | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ranar the Ever-Watchful
trans-unit.target: 永恒守护拉纳尔

trans-unit.resname: KHC·2 | Ranar the Ever-Watchful | Card Text: Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 飞行，警戒

trans-unit.resname: KHC·2 | Ranar the Ever-Watchful | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: The first card you foretell each turn costs {0} to foretell.
trans-unit.target: 你每回合预示的第一张牌支付{0}来预示。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·2 | Ranar the Ever-Watchful | Card Text: Paragraph 3

trans-unit.target: 每当你从你手上放逐牌和／或从战场上放逐永久物且数量达一或更多时，派出一个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: Cosmic Intervention
trans-unit.target: 寰宇干预

trans-unit.resname: KHC·3 | Cosmic Intervention | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If a permanent you control would be put into a graveyard from the battlefield this turn, exile it instead. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 本回合中，如果某个由你操控的永久物将从战场进入坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·3 | Cosmic Intervention | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Foretell {1}{W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
trans-unit.target: 预示{1}{W}（在你的回合中，你可以支付{2}并从你手上牌面朝下地放逐此牌。过了该回合后，便可利用其预示费用来施放之。）

trans-unit.target: 每当你从你手上放逐牌和／或从战场上放逐永久物且数量达一或更多时，在碧塔嘉勇士上放置等量的+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·4 | Hero of Bretagard | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As long as Hero of Bretagard has five or more counters on it, it has flying and is an Angel in addition to its other types.
trans-unit.target: 只要碧塔嘉勇士上有五个或更多指示物，它便具有飞行异能，且额外具有天使此类别。

trans-unit.resname: KHC·4 | Hero of Bretagard | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: As long as Hero of Bretagard has ten or more counters on it, it has indestructible and is a God in addition to its other types.
trans-unit.target: 只要碧塔嘉勇士上有十个或更多指示物，它便具有不灭异能，且额外具有神此类别。
